jobDescription: Title:Senior  Marketing Data AnalystsDuties: Perform market data analysis and research to design, customer experience  and success programs, engagement, marketing strategies, reports, business  opportunities; utilize analytics and reporting tools to generate reports and  analyze activity to improve performance; define and execute customer lifecycle  model; work with sales and technical teams to identify and engage with customer  stakeholders; work with executive, marketing and sales team to monitor, escalate  customer success metrics; use qualitative and quantitative analysis to drive  operational efficiency; perform similar duties Requirements: BS or foreign  equivalent in Computer Science / IS / Business / Engineering (any) / IT /  Marketing / Related and 5 years relevant progressive experience in marketing  analysis for IT products including at least 3 years experience in data driven  analysis to improve customer experience (OR) MS or foreign equivalent in above  and 3 years experience in marketing analysis for IT products including data  driven analysis to improve customer experience Location: Natick, MA  Fulltime, Travel/Relocation  involved to the client location within the US. Respond  to: HR  Department, Bahwan Cybertek, Inc., 209 West Central Street, Ste 312, Natick, MA  Position is eligible for our employee referral program. Requirements: BS or foreign  equivalent in Computer Science / IS / Business / Engineering (any) / IT /  Marketing / Related and 5 years relevant progressive experience in marketing  analysis for IT products including at least 3 years experience in data driven  analysis to improve customer experience (OR) MS or foreign equivalent in above  and 3 years experience in marketing analysis for IT products including data  driven analysis to improve customer experience
